TEXT: The applicant , born in DATE , is an NORP national of NORP origin and resident in GPE , GPE .
In DATE criminal proceedings were instituted against the applicant on the suspicion of insult . In these proceedings defence counsel assisted him .
On DATE , following a hearing , the GPE ( GPE ) ORG ( ORG ) convicted the applicant of insult and of having caused false suspicion , and imposed a fine of CARDINAL DATE rates of MONEY ( ORG ) .
According to section CARDINAL of LAW ) , insult ( PERSON ) is an offence punishable with a maximum of DATE imprisonment or a fine .

ORG found that in the course of a dispute between the applicant and the foreign couple Mr and PERSON about their alleged unlawful parking , he had stated that “ they came from the LOC and did not know about NORP law ” , and he had called them “ GPE ” , a term used in NORP language to disparage foreigners . Moreover , in the investigation proceedings instituted at PERSON and PERSON request , he laid information against them pretending that they had insulted him in the course of the above dispute , that PERSON had threatened him with force and that they had committed a parking offence . Subsequently , the applicant had also laid information against a witness of the above dispute , PERSON , pretending that this person had also insulted him . ORG established these facts on the basis of the applicant ’s statements as well as on the evidence given by PERSON and PERSON , Mr DATE PERSON , the applicant ’s life companion , and PERSON , a customs officer having witnessed the dispute in the course of an observation of the place . It also had before it photographs of the place in question .

On DATE , following oral hearings , ORG ( Land - gericht ) , upon the applicant ’s appeal , reduced the fine to CARDINAL DATE rates of DEM CARDINAL and dismissed the remainder of the appeal . ORG , on the basis of its own taking of evidence , confirmed in essence the establishment of facts by ORG . Thus the applicant had started a dispute with PERSON and PERSON about their allegedly wrong parking , stating that “ they were not on the LOC and had to comply with NORP traffic regulations ” and , in his annoyance , he had called them “ GPE ” . The court found that PERSON statements were refuted by the evidence given by PERSON , a neutral witness who had credibly explained that as a dog - fancier he would have seen PERSON and her dog . ORG , having regard to the material before it , including a site plan and photographs , also considered that an inspection of the place of the events had not been necessary . Furthermore , ORG rejected the applicant ’s arguments that the expression “ GPE ” was a neutral denomination of LOC NORP , considering that in NORP language this expression was unfortunately used , in a disparaging manner , in relation to foreigners .
On DATE ORG ( Oberstes PERSON ) dismissed the applicant ’s appeal on points of law .
On DATE ORG ( Bundesverfassungsgericht ) refused to entertain the applicant 's constitutional appeal . The decision was served on DATE .
